document_api_meta.title: Get Showcase Products
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API lists the products in the creator's showcase, paginated by specified page size and iterated through pages by page token for up to 2000 products in the showcase. This API is generally used when a creator would like to view the products in the showcase.  The platform will return the product details in the showcase, as well as the products in the livebag if the creator is live streaming.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The creator access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 1. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a362dccb8030ea6f98c) to get creator access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The number of results to be returned per page. Valid range: [1-20].

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the next_page_token from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: origin
request_query_param.desc: Set to `LIVE` to indicate the request originates from a Live room. Set to `SHOWCASE` to indicate that the request originates from the Showcase.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^products
response_param.desc: A list of products.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The product's product ID

response_param.name: ^^shop
response_param.desc: Data and metadata associated with the Seller's TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: The TikTok Shop name.

response_param.name: ^^addition
response_param.desc: An object including data about product images.

response_param.name: ^^^customized_main_images
response_param.desc: A list of product images.

response_param.name: ^^^^width
response_param.desc: The image width in pixels.

response_param.name: ^^^^heigth
response_param.desc: The image height in pixels.

response_param.name: ^^^^url
response_param.desc: The product's TikTok Shop image URL.

response_param.name: ^^price
response_param.desc: An object including data about the product price.

response_param.name: ^^^original_price
response_param.desc: The original price of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest original price for the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest original price for the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_discount_price
response_param.desc: An object including data about the product discount price.

response_param.name: ^^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest discount price.

response_param.name: ^^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest discount price.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^platform_discount_price
response_param.desc: An object including data about the product platform discount price.

response_param.name: ^^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest product platform discount price.

response_param.name: ^^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest product platform discount price.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^title
response_param.desc: The product's display title.

response_param.name: ^^main_images
response_param.desc: A list of product images.

response_param.name: ^^^width
response_param.desc: The image width in pixels.

response_param.name: ^^^heigth
response_param.desc: The image height in pixels.

response_param.name: ^^^url
response_param.desc: The product's TikTok Shop image URL.

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc: An object including product status information.

response_param.name: ^^^inventory_status
response_param.desc:
The product inventory status. This an enumerated type with values:
- IN_STOCK
- SOLD_OUT

response_param.name: ^^^review_status
response_param.desc:
The product review status. This is an enumerated type with values:
- APPROVED
- CHANGES_UNDER_REVIEW
- UNAVAILABLE
- ZERO_COMMISSION

response_param.name: ^^^is_hidden
response_param.desc: Set to `false` if the product is visible in the showcase. Set to `true` if the product is hidden from the showcase.

response_param.name: ^^^added_status
response_param.desc:
The product showcase status. This is an enumerated type with values:
- NOT_ADDED
- ADDED
- REJECTED

response_param.name: ^^source
response_param.desc:
The product source. This is an enumerated type with values:
- THIRD_PARTY
- AFFILIATE
- TIKTOK_STORE

response_param.name: ^^detail_link
response_param.desc: The product detail page URL.

response_param.name: ^^third_party_link
response_param.desc: The off-TikTok Shop product detail page URL.

response_param.name: ^^sale_regions
response_param.desc: A list of regions in which the product is offered for sale.

response_param.name: ^^commission
response_param.desc: An object including data about commissions associated with the product.

response_param.name: ^^^rate
response_param.desc: The commission rate in hundredths of a percent. For example, `3587` is a commission rate of `35.87%`. The range of this value is [100, 8000].

response_param.name: ^^^reward_rate
response_param.desc: The reward commission rate in hundredths of a percent. For example, `3587` is a commission rate of `35.87%`.

response_param.name: ^^collaboration
response_param.desc: An object including data about open or target collaboration for the product.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The open or target collaboration identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^type
response_param.desc:
The collaboration type. This an enumerated type with values:
1 - Open Collaboration
2 - Target Collaboration
5 - Partner Campaign
11 - Flat Fee
12 - Collaboration Plus
13 - Affiliate Promotion

response_param.name: ^^^partner
response_param.desc: The partner information.

response_param.name: ^^^^id
response_param.desc: The partner identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^^name
response_param.desc: The partner name.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: Total count of products in the response.

error_code_list.msg: This creator account has no selection region.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access up to 2000 products in the creators showcase.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access the products in your showcase.
